titleproper.value: Guide to the Joseph Bendich Collection <num>MSS.534</num>

creation.value: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace <date>2018-05-18T19:28:29</date>

extent.value: in 3 record cartons and 1 small box

abstract.value: Joseph Bendich (1917-2005) was a amateur videographer and machinist who manufactured parts for lunar landing modules. This collection consists of film equipment and other items collected by Bendich for private film viewings. Materials include a Super 8mm movie projector, a Super 8mm movie light, a Keystone Super 8mm camera, a camera case, a photo lamp, a Revere film splicer, and splice tape instructions. The collection also includes three Super 8mm pornographic films: <emph render="italic">Jocks and Socks</emph> (Golden Girls), <emph render="italic">Sex Ed Tutor</emph> (Diamond Collection), and <emph render="italic">Reluctant Virgin Pt II</emph> (San Francisco Series). The artifacts in this collection are emblematic of the types of film equipment used by many Super 8mm auteurs of the late 20th century, including Nelson Sullivan, Chris Kraus, and David Wojnarowicz. This collection documents the ways in which pornography - particularly stag film - was circulated and watched during this time period.

p.value: Identification of item, date; Joseph Bendich Collection; MSS 534; box number; folder number; Fales Library and Special Collections, New York University.
Donated by Debra Schiff in October 2016; the accession number associated with this gift is 2018.074.
Joseph Bendich (1917-2005) was a amateur videographer and machinist who manufactured parts for lunar landing modules. He also owned a French laundry service.

This collection consists of film equipment and other items collected by Joseph Bendich for private film viewings. Materials include a Super 8mm movie projector, a Super8mm movie light, a Keystone Super 8mm camera, a camera case, a photo lamp, a Revere film splicer, and splice tape instructions. The collection also includes three Super 8mm pornographic films: <emph render="italic">Jocks and Socks</emph> (Golden Girls), <emph render="italic">Sex Ed Tutor</emph> (Diamond Collection), and <emph render="italic">Reluctant Virgin Pt II</emph> (San Francisco Series). The artifacts in this collection are emblematic of the types of film equipment used by many Super 8mm auteurs of the late 20th century, including Nelson Sullivan, Chris Kraus, and David Wojnarowicz. This collection documents the ways in which pornography - particularly stag film - was circulated and watched during this time period.
